name: react-tiny-dom
description: A minimal implementation of react-dom to learn custom renderers

scripts.copy: cp index.html dist/index.html && cp favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico && mkdir dist/dist && cp dist/main.js dist/dist/main.js
scripts.deploy: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run copy && gh-pages -d dist

author: Jiayi Hu <jiayi.ghu@gmail.com>
